wikipedia_page.main: Lancelot Andrew Noel Slocock (also known as Andrew Slocock) (25 December 1886 – 9 August 1916) was a rugby union international who represented England from 1907 to 1908. He also captained his country.

response: * Lancelot Slocock (1886–1916), English rugby union player
